content_summary: The speaker discusses the concept of bioelectricity and its role in cellular communication, particularly in the context of cancer cells. They highlight how glioblastoma cells, a type of cancer cell, disconnect electrically from the collective, reverting to a unicellular lifestyle and losing their 'memory' of their role in larger biological structures.
